resources.string: Are you feeling sick ? For example : fever, sore throat, flu and headaches.
Besides the previous, are you having any cough or loss of smell and taste ?
Have you associated in any event known with covid-19 cluster ?
Have you travelled to any country outside Malaysia within the last 14 days ?
Have you been in close contact with any confirmed or suspected COVID-19 patient ?
Are you a MOH covid-19 volunteer in the last 14 days ?
You pose a threat to infect other customers at the premise therefore you are not credible to enter !
